title: Irrigation - North Field
description: Deep watering required for corn crop. Check soil moisture levels before and after irrigation.

title: Fertilizer Application - South Field
description: Apply nitrogen fertilizer to soybeans during vegetative growth stage.

title: Pest Inspection - East Field
description: Weekly pest inspection for wheat crop. Look for signs of aphids and fungal diseases.

title: Harvest Preparation - West Field
description: Prepare tomato harvest equipment and containers. Schedule harvest crew.

title: Soil Testing - Central Field
description: Collect soil samples for nutrient analysis. Test pH levels and organic matter content.

title: Weed Control - North Field
description: Apply herbicide for post-emergence weed control in corn field.

title: Equipment Maintenance
description: Service and maintain irrigation system. Check pumps, filters, and sprinklers.

title: Plant Support Installation
description: Install stakes and cages for tomato plants to support fruit development.

title: Disease Prevention Spray
description: Apply fungicide to prevent blight on potato crop. Focus on lower leaves.

title: Yield Estimation
description: Calculate expected yield for wheat harvest. Sample different areas of the field.
